data.message: "I just don't give a fuck" OCT '98      "I'm all political and junk" OCT '17     Here's some throwback material cuz I fucked up  NOV '17      Sorry Marshall, I ain't buying none of your shit.You fucked up. Deal with it, cuz "I just don't give a fuck"

replies.message: Did he hurt your feelings? It's okay, daddy Trump will save you.
Have you listening since '98 ?? Square Dance, We as Americans, White America, Mosh. Dudes always been political no need to cry cuz you don't like a freestyle lol
Bruhh he literally doesn't give a fuck if you buy or not. At the end of the day YOU LOSE, cause he's still a multi-millionaire. Now take your trump supporting emotional ass the fuck outa here.
Eminem has been political since '99 tho...
I think he stated in his last cypher, he doesn't want you as a fan.

So you were fine when he shittalked Clinton and Bush, but shitting on Trump takes it too far? 

You are either a total snowflake who can’t handle when it’s his turn or not a true Eminem fan to begin with, probably both.

Grow up

I don't support trump or killary. I literally don't give a fuck about it. Just pointing out after all the backlash he got from that "freestyle" now he's trying to release something from so long ago. Truth, he's got money, and it's not going anywhere, but what does that matter. Besides, yeah "white America" has been political in a lot of their music, Eminem hasn't been. until recently. Want to hear some real political music, go listen to System of a Down. Eminem's music used to be good no doubt, but after this whole political fiasco he put himself where he's not known to be

I mean, are you just forgetting about White America, Square Dance, Mosh, We as Americans... I don't get why people are so surprised and offended that he's against Trump. Marshall's never been shy about his politics. He was very vocal during the Bush presidency, and silent all throughout Obama, only to start voicing his opinion again now. There is absolutely no reason to be surprised by his beliefs. He's always been political. I don't care if he disses a politician (whether I like them or not). I just want him to make good music.
Can't buy CDs with food stamps kid

Can i say fuck you ??? Sure ... fuck u asshole !!! WHAT THE FUCK ARE YOU FOLLOWING HIM IF U DONT BUY HIS SHIT ??? ANYWAY YOU KNOW THAT HE DOESNT GIVE A FUCK A SHIT ABOUT WHAT U SAYING RIGHT ...SO ...AGAIN ...I AM FREE TO SAY ...UHMMM FUCK YOU !

Oh boys you need to understand him. Back for those titles mentioned, he didnt get the meaning, he just listened cause it was good to listen without understanding. Now the dude made it all very clear, they got the message, and now they dont like it. I wished he puts it in a way to mention that he doesnt need stupid shits listening to his art without getting the meaning only cause its cool to do so.

Please stop hating the stupids, they have enough problem already not to forget to breath every now and then

Says he doesn't give a fuck but he clearly does.

Because before saying he doesn't he said "I'm not buying your shit Eminem you dissed our president" wah wah wah

Idiot. He was always political, and he slammed Bush and Hillary. This must be your first time knowing his works. Too bad your head is too shoved up Trump's ass and get so triggered and offended when people aren't in your Trump cult. No one gives a fuck if you don't buy, you ain't shit.
If Shady saw you screaming that you won't buy the album, best believe he'll whisper "I just don't give a fuck" and keep scrolling. 🔥
And no one gives a fuck what you think
